text:
Peter Winters. In addition to the alpha and beta smoothing factors, a new parameter is added
called gamma (g or γ) that controls the inﬂuence on the seasonal component. As with the trend,
the seasonality may be modeled as either an additive or multiplicative process for a linear or
exponential change in the seasonality.
 Additive Seasonality: Triple Exponential Smoothing with a linear seasonality.
 Multiplicative Seasonality: Triple Exponential Smoothing with an exponential season-
ality.
